snippet: The merger proxy for Mallinckrodt’s $5.6 billion bid for Questcor Pharmaceuticals does not include reports of incidents involving Acthar, Questcor’s immune-system drug and its biggest product.
abstract: Merger proxy for Mallinckrodt’s $5.6 billion bid for Questcor Pharmaceuticals does not include reports of incidents involving Acthar, immune-system drug that is Questcor’s biggest product; incidents include 20 deaths and six disabilities since 2012; issue is just one of many hanging over Questcor, which also faces inquiries concerning marketing practices and labeling.
lead_paragraph: The merger proxy for Mallinckrodt’s $5.6 billion bid for Questcor Pharmaceuticals does not include reports of incidents involving Acthar, Questcor’s immune-system drug and its biggest product.

headline.main: Drug Merger Discussion Leaves Out a Key Risk
headline.print_headline: Drug Merger Discussion Leaves Out a Key Risk
